pr_title: generate xref for non empty compressed files

timeline.message: reuse basic indexer test as xref test

move finishWriting() to the common finally block

fixes #3373

timeline.bodyText:
Please don't relocate this. That breaks known failure handling where we would actually not want to finish writing. I.e. finishWriting() in advance of a RuntimeException catch is deliberate.
Recommend you swallow web exceptions as per your alternative idea. Web exceptions didn't used to abort an index run; you used to be able to index without Opengrok web running. Not sure what changed or when to break that.
timeline.author: idodeclare

replies.bodyText: Oh, okay. Also added a comment there. The API failure is really a soft one.
